Consideration 2: Find diverse methods for providing assessment feedback for learners.

When planning assessment, remember how digital tools can enrich assessment from the learner82s view to help create positive feedback, scaffold content learning, and develop self-regulation.

Tip:

Consider options like gamified quizzes, tests, peer discussion forums, asynchronous or real-time teacher feedback, portfolios, online posts, simulations, and automated feedback via intelligent tutoring (see also 4c2.3. Play and creativeness4d).
